history.question: Which treaty ended World War I and imposed heavy reparations on Germany?
Who was the first Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire?
What year did the Berlin Wall fall, marking the symbolic end of the Cold War?
Which European country was the first to grant women the right to vote in national elections?
What was the name of the pandemic that devastated Europe in the 14th century?
Who led the Soviet Union during World War II?
Which European country was the birthplace of the Renaissance?
What event is considered the start of World War I?
options: The signing of the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk
The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand
history.answer: The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand
